description.en:
1-2) Love Knot & Re:Start
Tomoya rejected the confession from his classmate, Kazuki, stating height as the main reason. Two years later, Kazuki became taller and came back once more. However, the Kazuki that used to protect Tomoya in fights became gentle and kind. Will Tomoya be able to face his own feelings now and accept Kazuki? Includes the individual stories of the twins, Yuu and Kaede, with their lovers, Shougo and Jin and two one-shots.

3) Loveliness
Twins Yuu and Kaede have similar taste and men, the question is does Yuu need to steal Shougo's heart or was it his in the first place?

4) Use That Arm Again to Hold Me
Jin want's to know why Keade broke up with him a year ago via e-mail with no explanation, he's determined to get Keade back.

5) Just Love the Way You Are
When Jin see's how depressed Yuu is he decides to take matter's into his own hands and confront Shougo.

6) Captive
Will the playboy infirmary sensei Kajimoto ever change?

7) Blindly Love
Kaname doesn't know if his senior Arisawa Rie is serious about him or if he's just playing around.
